entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
